DOC.criteria: Type 2 diabetes Currently treat insulin Body mass index ( BMI ) less equal 40.0 kg/m2 HbA1c le equal 11.0 % Total daily insulin dosage less equal 100 IU U/day Current smoke smoking within last 6 month Cardiac problem Uncontrolled hypertension Current proliferative retinopathy maculopathy
